definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Watching was our LA correspondent Peter Bowes.

sentences.english: Here is “correspondent” Miao Wanfu again for People’s Daily Online, and for Hebei Daily.

sentences.english: The editor eventually accepted a toned-down version of the correspondent's dispatch.
sentences.chinese: 主編最後接受了這位通訊員一篇措辭溫和的快訊。
大衛漢布林，《新科學家》通訊員。

sentences.english: Iron Iliad correspondent khufu sacrifice of the news to all.
sentences.chinese: 鐵虎將通訊員老胡犧牲的消息告訴衆人。
